artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yamato Shinbunsha; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of slightly frowning man in rectangle in LRC, with red lips, looking toward PR, wearing grey striped kimono; orange ground; rectangular block of text at left with blue and purple background shading; large red and green seals, LLC and URC, with smudged red seals at left and right edges of sheet
markings: Artist’s seal: 大蘇 {Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 円活刀 {Enkatsu tō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Yamato Newspaper (Yamato Shinbun やまと新聞)
title: Number Four
